About Me

Let me tell you a little about myself and what I do...

Your Project Is In Safe Hands

I am a web developer with a passion for photography and travel. I am currently living in Melbourne, Victoria. I love to learn and am always looking to take on new projects that challenge my skills. I have experience in all the major web technologies, from html to JavaScript, and can learn anything new quickly. I pride myself on excellent communication with my team and customers. I am open for freelance projects or full-time opportunities that could lead to long-term partnerships.
